definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: perh. be acquainted with (Ar. 4a9ara perceive [Sab. [[שער]] id.? Hom:Chrest. 124]; cf. Aram. [[סְעַר]], s9ar, visit, inspect, Ba:ES 67 RS in Dr:Dt Perles:Anal. 79);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[שְׂעָרוּם]] De 32:17 new gods, with whom your fathers had no acquaintance (LXX ei)/dhsan; ‖[[יְדָעוּם ]]); usu. fear, Thes revere with awe, Dr shudder before, [[[שָׂעַר]]] denom., although not elsewh. c. acc. pers.
